title: Compiler panic when using generic associated types

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

body:
The compiler panics when using a [generic associated type](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/44265) as a bound on a trait requirement's associated type, as shown below.

[Playground link](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=ff11dd72cd5efa94c764e5564754c496)

```rust
#![feature(generic_associated_types)]

use std::ops::Deref;

trait SomeTrait {
    type Assoc<T>: Deref<Target = T>;
}

fn main() {
}
```

Backtrace:

```
error: internal compiler error: src/librustc/ty/subst.rs:480: Type parameter `T/#1` (T/1) out of range when substituting (root type=Some(T)) substs=[Self]

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:534:9
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
             at src/libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:39
   1: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print
             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:70
   2: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}
             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:58
             at src/libstd/panicking.rs:200

  15: rustc::ty::subst::Subst::subst

  17: rustc::ty::GenericPredicates::instantiate_into

  19: rustc::ty::wf::WfPredicates::compute_trait_ref

  29: rustc::ty::query::plumbing::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'gcx, 'tcx>>::try_get_with
  30: rustc::ty::query::plumbing::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'gcx, 'tcx>>::ensure_query
  31: rustc::hir::Crate::visit_all_item_likes
  32: rustc::util::common::time

end of query stack
error: aborting due to previous error


note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.34.0-nightly (e54494727 2019-02-13) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type bin

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

error: Could not compile `playground`.
```
